name: DinoMess: Dinosaur Games in AR
description:
DinoMess is dinosaur adventure games with AR (augmented reality) features, where you hunt for dino around your neighborhood and fight with another dinosaur in PvP battles. Explore your local area, use baits to catch more different dinosaurs. Just going outside and hunting with millions of another dino hunter LIVE. Get achievements for exploring the world. Hunt for dino before they hunt you
Features:
• HUNT for 24 different 3D dinosaurs, which available in AR (augmented reality) mode:
• Carnivorous (Allosaurus, Baryonyx, Deynonyx, Spinosaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex (T-rex), Velociraptor)
• Natatorium (Pliosaurus, Plesiosaur, Nothosaurus, Mosasaurus)
• Herbivorous (Dracorex, Triceratops, Pachych, Protoceratops, Stegosaurus, Ankylosaurus, Apatosaurus, Diplodocus, Iguanodon, Styracosaurus)
• Flying (Pteranodon, Pterodactyl, Archaeopteryx)
• CLASH your dinosaurs in combats (2 modes): PvP Fights and Dino Arena Battles
• FEED and level up your dino with DNA and get the most powerful species
• MERGE your dinosaurs to inherit skills in Evolution Lab
• COLLECT Dino Eggs to grow new dinosaur
• FIND and open Dino Boxes to get useful supplies
• COMPLETE tasks to earn different bonuses
• PLAY in Wheel of Fortune and win cool boosters every day
• INVITE your friends to discover dinosaurs together, and share achievements in social media to get additional bonuses

Follow us on social media to get more news, promos and cool stuff!
FB: https://www.facebook.com/DinomessGame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dinomess.game/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dinomessgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe_PpMbiGFQSKP59oEuVMbg

Terms of use can be found at https://dinomess.com/#modal1
Please note: DinoMess Game is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.
